title: [Abbey Library]
description: Dark shelves line the walls, filled with crumbling leather-bound volumes and scrolls.  A small fireplace stands at the far end of the room, its tall, plaster hood tapering gracefully into a spear-shaped point near the ceiling.  Tall mullioned windows reflect light into the room from the snow-covered landscape outside.
